about_the_game:
Tammy and Matthew dream of owning their own restaurant! But how can you achieve your dreams without the much-needed experience and capital? The culinary tournament is the solution to all problems. The heroes will not stop in front of difficulties and risks and will go on a culinary journey to learn the intricacies of the restaurant business and the culinary art of various restaurants in the world. Victory and the dream will be in their hands, of course, if you help them on their adventure!

Embark on a cozy culinary journey to different parts of the world and have a lot of fun! Discover the wonders of the restaurants of the world!

Functional controls and clear tutorial will help you easily understand the basics of the game. "Travel Cuisine" - a cozy adventure in different restaurants around the world!

- Delicious dishes - Burritos, sushi, cream soups, cakes and much more!
- Tammy and Matthew are a pair of young restaurateurs who will always be with you on your adventure!
- Thoughtful plot, colorful comics and characters, each with its own mood!
- Fascinating gameplay, the chance to feel like the boss in the kitchen of an elite restaurant.
- Lots of funny and very hungry customers.
- 45 unique levels.
- 3 restaurants where you will get to work hard - an oriental sushi bar, a classic bakery and a Mexican restaurant!
- Over 25 hours of exciting gameplay for any age.
- Pleasant theme-based music.

name: Travel Cuisine Collector's Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
